p.if: If you are an initiate it costs only 10 Shards to purchase Tyrnai's blessing.

Cross off the money and mark COMBAT in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet. The blessing works by allowing you to try again when you fail a COMBAT roll. It is good for only one reroll. When you use the blessing, cross it off your Adventure Sheet. You can have only one COMBAT blessing at any one time. Once it is used up, you can return to any temple of Tyrnai to buy a new one.
